item.title: Drop all of one item in your inventory
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Modified it again for bitmaps. What are the chances of this being included in the next SRL?
[scar]program Test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
var copper: integer;

Procedure DropAllOf(ItemBmp: Integer; ItemName: String);
begin
Repeat
If (FindBitmapToleranceIn(ItemBmp, x, y, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,30)) Then
begin
MMouse(x, y, 5, 5);
Wait(300);
GetMousePos(x, y);
If (IsUpText(ItemName)) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False);
Wait(300);
ChooseOption(x, y, ‘Drop’);
Wait(1000);
end;
end;
Until(Not (FindBitmapToleranceIn(ItemBmp, x, y, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2,30)));
end;

begin
copper:= BitmapFromString(9, 14, ‘z78DA3333333333777523119851499’ +
‘70106C0AF0B971A4C71625C48AA2E625C488C7AFCA1417C189217’ +
‘1A0678012D6279B0E90200AC99C219’);
SetUpSRL;
ActivateClient;
DropAllOf(copper, ‘Copper ore’);
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: Drop all of one item in your inventory

item.title: Drop all of one item in your inventory
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[scar]program Test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

Procedure DropAllOf(ItemColour: Integer; ItemName: String);
var
xv,yx: integer;
begin
Repeat
If (FindColor(xv, yx, ItemColour, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2)) Then
begin
MMouse(xv, yx, 5, 5);
Wait(300);
GetMousePos(xv, yx);
If (IsUpText(ItemName)) then
begin
Mouse(xv, yx, 0, 0, False);
Wait(300);
ChooseOption(xv, yx, ‘Drop’);
Wait(1000);
end;
end;
Until(Not (FindColor(xv, yx, ItemColour, MIX1, MIY1, MIX2, MIY2)));
end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
ActivateClient;
DropAllOf(3636181, ‘Copper ore’);
end.[/scar]

Hope You Like It

Read full topic

item.title: Drop all of one item in your inventory
item.dc:creator: @Krazy_Meerkat Krazy_Meerkat
item.description:
@Krazy_Meerkat wrote:

That is not an error, it’s a hint. The script works.
Here:
[scar]program Test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
iron: integer;

function dropallof(var item: integer): boolean;
var
xv,yv,dropbmp: integer;
begin
Result:= False;
dropbmp := BitmapFromString(28, 8, ‘z78DA7373430003303075313531314’ +
‘7127683880C2CE946843B91C5878A3BDD7000FC2613133BF8D553’ +
‘EE4E0324804B2F04E0722D31EA297127A60B29F73B3171478999A’ +
‘3EE24061093F648CD17F8CDC4A51E00DFA53DB9’);
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then
begin
repeat
begin
mouse(xv+7+random(5),yv+10+random(5),1,1,false)
wait(750+random(250))
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(dropbmp,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
findnormalrandoms
wait(750+random(250))
end;
until(FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=false)
Result:= True;
end;
end;

begin
setupsrl
activateclient
iron := BitmapFromString(17, 8, ‘z78DA7D9261AE84200C84AF04EDB48’ +
‘59F2A72FF23BDAEC5A4FBDC5D4D2A41F86698C2832B31C08D0C83’ +
‘4FDAE5F4AFAA0871D7299D4FDB94A14DF4C0BE6A51432FAFA7722’ +
‘17F630C50AFE7AA9D06150C9AFFF8E2FFA71226B75031714D7EE3’ +
‘37751731CE2AA218A0A595F852FD1422159546F0E5C0E6A6D3293’ +
‘EF0772B9851DF54E07B976ED49B7FD5C827F9F76884F70FFCAC32’ +
‘8CA466E622471A97C37B8641164C3DC478FCF6FF64DEBD78652E0’ +
‘DC6356866EAB3798D7B3A50BEE59F574632B9D74E1FF55CFEC36D’ +
‘F864DDB0E55DCFFBF38D9CF9DE5DA90D9D77EA3987ECF679037F9’ +
‘3A3B3B9BF7CDDFF9552F023932BAB9C4310FE00BEBCAB19’);
if(dropallof(iron))then
writeln(‘Dropped all the iron’);
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Drop all of one item in your inventory
item.dc:creator: @puj puj
item.description:
@puj wrote:

You are getting that error because you have put your variables after begin in the script.

Also there are quite a few other errors in the script that i have fixed. Including making iron a variable at the top like it would be in a proper script when it was being used.

[scar]program Test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
iron: integer;

function dropallof(var item: integer): boolean;

var
xv,yv,dropbmp: integer;

begin
dropbmp := BitmapFromString(28, 8, ‘z78DA7373430003303075313531314’ +
‘7127683880C2CE946843B91C5878A3BDD7000FC2613133BF8D553’ +
‘EE4E0324804B2F04E0722D31EA297127A60B29F73B3171478999A’ +
‘3EE24061093F648CD17F8CDC4A51E00DFA53DB9’);
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then
begin
repeat
begin
mouse(xv+7+random(5),yv+10+random(5),1,1,false)
wait(750+random(250))
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(dropbmp,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
findnormalrandoms
wait(750+random(250))
end;
until(FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=false)
end;
end;

begin
setupsrl
activateclient
iron := BitmapFromString(17, 8, ‘z78DA7D9261AE84200C84AF04EDB48’ +
‘59F2A72FF23BDAEC5A4FBDC5D4D2A41F86698C2832B31C08D0C83’ +
‘4FDAE5F4AFAA0871D7299D4FDB94A14DF4C0BE6A51432FAFA7722’ +
‘17F630C50AFE7AA9D06150C9AFFF8E2FFA71226B75031714D7EE3’ +
‘37751731CE2AA218A0A595F852FD1422159546F0E5C0E6A6D3293’ +
‘EF0772B9851DF54E07B976ED49B7FD5C827F9F76884F70FFCAC32’ +
‘8CA466E622471A97C37B8641164C3DC478FCF6FF64DEBD78652E0’ +
‘DC6356866EAB3798D7B3A50BEE59F574632B9D74E1FF55CFEC36D’ +
‘F864DDB0E55DCFFBF38D9CF9DE5DA90D9D77EA3987ECF679037F9’ +
‘3A3B3B9BF7CDDFF9552F023932BAB9C4310FE00BEBCAB19’);
dropallof(iron)
end.
[/scar]

EDIT: Now i get this error, Line 7: [Hint] (14457:10): Variable ‘Result’ never used in script and i cant even find the variable “result” in the script.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop all of one item in your inventory
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

This is a code I use in my scripts, but I’m trying to make it a function and keep getting this error:
Line 6: [Error] (14051:1): Identifier expected in script C:\Program Files\programs\rs\auto\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\mine\dropallof.scar
Here’s the code, any idea whats wrong?:
[scar]program Test;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

function dropallof(var item: integer): boolean;
begin
var xv,yv,dropbmp: integer;

dropbmp := BitmapFromString(28, 8, ‘z78DA7373430003303075313531314’ +
‘7127683880C2CE946843B91C5878A3BDD7000FC2613133BF8D553’ +
‘EE4E0324804B2F04E0722D31EA297127A60B29F73B3171478999A’ +
‘3EE24061093F648CD17F8CDC4A51E00DFA53DB9’);
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then
begin
repeat
begin
mouse(xv+7+random(5),yv+10+random(5),1,1,false)
wait(750+random(250))
if FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(dropbmp,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=true then mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
findnormalrandoms
wait(750+random(250))
end;
until(FindbitmapSpiralTolerance(item,xv, yv, 561, 214, 730, 460, 70)=false)
end;
end;

begin
setupsrl
acrivateclient
var iron: integer;
iron := BitmapFromString(17, 8, ‘z78DA7D9261AE84200C84AF04EDB48’ +
‘59F2A72FF23BDAEC5A4FBDC5D4D2A41F86698C2832B31C08D0C83’ +
‘4FDAE5F4AFAA0871D7299D4FDB94A14DF4C0BE6A51432FAFA7722’ +
‘17F630C50AFE7AA9D06150C9AFFF8E2FFA71226B75031714D7EE3’ +
‘37751731CE2AA218A0A595F852FD1422159546F0E5C0E6A6D3293’ +
‘EF0772B9851DF54E07B976ED49B7FD5C827F9F76884F70FFCAC32’ +
‘8CA466E622471A97C37B8641164C3DC478FCF6FF64DEBD78652E0’ +
‘DC6356866EAB3798D7B3A50BEE59F574632B9D74E1FF55CFEC36D’ +
‘F864DDB0E55DCFFBF38D9CF9DE5DA90D9D77EA3987ECF679037F9’ +
‘3A3B3B9BF7CDDFF9552F023932BAB9C4310FE00BEBCAB19’);
dropallof(iron)
end.[/scar]
